name: Jas Sum Kral - Red Knight - 7x38 Lancero
additionalNotes:
Jas Sum Kral (JSK) launched a few years ago as a project by Riste Ristevski.  Originally sold only through his website, he's now launched nationally and internationally due to an insane amount of customer demand. Jas Sum Kral Cigars come from Nicaragua, which lies southwest of Cuba. Although countries 
Jas Sum Kral cigars, which translate to “I am King”, are new to the industry but have flourished since starting. At Havana House, we sell a wide range of Jas Sum Kral cigars that vary in sizes, flavours, wraps and blends.
